page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: A SAMPLE SURVEY OF EMPLOYMENT OF HEADS OF HOUSEHOLDS WAS TAKEN IN OUR AREA. IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT OVER 80% OF THOSE WHO TOOK PART IN THE SURVEY WERE OCCUPIED IN A MANAGERIAL OR SUPERVISORY CAPACITY.HERE IS A BREAK- DOWN OF THE STATISTICS: 18% IN OFFICES 18% IN ENGINEERING 13% IN BANKING OR ACCOUNTANCY 10% IN THE POLICE OR FIRE SERVICE 10% IN THE MEDICAL SERVICES 7% IN SHOPS 6% IN GOVERNMENT SERVICES MOST HEADS OF HOUSEHOLD ARE AWAY FROM HOME FOR OVER 10 HOURS PER DAY.THIS INCLUDES WORK + TRAVEL TIME. 4% OF HEADS OF HOUSEHOLD ARE WOMEN WHO HOLD FULL TIME JOBS. OTHER OCCUPATIONS NOTED IN THE SURVEY INCLUDED LEISURE SERVICES,TRANSPORT, BUILDING AND LAW.
